alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cleburne (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 2:17PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun and southeastern Cleburne Counties through 245 PM CST... At 217 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Heflin, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Heflin, Fruithurst, Edwardsville, Muscadine, Abernathy, Lake Cleburne, I 20 Welcome Center, Sweetwater Lake, Coleman Lake And Campground and Choccolocco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
